veil-other.name: Veil Other
veil-other.description: Grant one ally within touch range the effects of Fade for 30 minutes. If the ally attacks or casts offensive magic, only their concealment ends, yours remains.
veil-other.notes: Requires Fade ability to be known. Effect mirrors Fade but on an ally.

weapon-mastery.name: Weapon Mastery
weapon-mastery.description: You are proficient with all weapons. When using a weapon for the first time in combat, gain +2 D20 on your first attack with it.

void-sight.name: Void Sight
void-sight.description: Caster can see invisible creatures and objects, see through magical illusions, and gains +2 D20 on checks to detect hidden doors or traps.
void-sight.notes: Can see all that is hidden

weapon-bond.name: Weapon Bond
weapon-bond.description: Choose one weapon you're holding. Gain +1 D20 on attack rolls with it. Cannot be disarmed of this weapon. Can recall weapon within 50ft

precise-cut.name: Precise Cut
precise-cut.description: 2D8 + SPD Modifier damage. Ignores 2 points of damage reduction. +1 D20 on attack roll.

burst-of-speed.name: Burst of Speed
burst-of-speed.description: Your movement speed doubles this turn. Gain +1 D20 on SPD checks. At turn's end, lose 5 ST from exertion.
